metadata.name: Potential NTLM Coercion Via Certutil.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects possible NTLM coercion via certutil using the 'syncwithWU' flag

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certutil.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -syncwithwu ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\')))

output.summary: Detects possible NTLM coercion via certutil using the 'syncwithWU' flag
